title: Digital Security Tips to Prevent the Cops From Ruining Your Trip Abroad
description:
Traveling with a phone and laptop? Here are digital security tips to keep your devices and your data safe from the cops.

The post Digital Security Tips to Prevent the Cops From Ruining Your Trip Abroad appeared first on The Intercept.

title: The Ejection of Tucker Carlson Is a Classic “Reverse Ferret” by Rupert Murdoch
description:
Walking up to the edge of what might destroy Fox News, and then doing an about-face, is the business strategy of the network's owner.

The post The Ejection of Tucker Carlson Is a Classic “Reverse Ferret” by Rupert Murdoch appeared first on The Intercept.
